summary: This is an email exchange from October 9, 2020, regarding the tracking and verification of evidence items (NY Cart numbers) related to the Epstein case. A Special Agent from the FBI New York Field Office requests a Senior Forensic Examiner to check on specific evidence items at the evidence garage, with coordination involving a NY CART Coordinator and a person named Kelly.

persons.name: NY CART Coordinator
persons.context: Receives a request from a Special Agent to check on evidence items and coordinates with a Senior Forensic Examiner.

persons.name: Senior Forensic Examiner
persons.context: Addressed in the email to check on evidence items at the evidence garage regarding NY Cart numbers.

persons.name: Kelly
persons.context: Copied on the email to assist with questions while the Special Agent is out of the office.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Author of the email requesting verification of evidence item numbers and coordination for the Epstein case investigation.

connections.description: The Special Agent communicates a request to the NY CART Coordinator regarding evidence tracking.
The Special Agent directs the Senior Forensic Examiner to check on evidence items at the evidence garage.
The Special Agent copies Kelly on the email to provide backup support while they are out of the office.
The NY CART Coordinator is involved in coordinating the evidence check with the Senior Forensic Examiner.

events.title: Evidence verification request
events.description: An FBI Special Agent emails a request to check on specific evidence items (NY Cart numbers) related to the Epstein case at the evidence garage.

keyFacts: The document is an email from October 9, 2020, showing ongoing evidence management in the Epstein case investigation.
Specific evidence items are referenced by codes (e.g., 18 53, 1B 57, 1B 29-40) needing verification of their NY Cart numbers.
An FBI Special Agent is coordinating with a NY CART Coordinator and a Senior Forensic Examiner to track and verify evidence.
The email indicates careful evidence tracking procedures, including checking for duplicates and confirming processing status.
